newsitem.title: USA: Symetics says gets $10.7 mln in contracts.
newsitem.headline: Symetics says gets $10.7 mln in contracts.

text.p: Symetrics Industries Inc said Friday it won new contracts totaling $10.7 million.

New awards of $9.9 million are for aerospace defense products and include 179 of the company's improved data modems, which are communications products currently operational in U.S. and allied military aircraft.
Over $800,000 of the new awards are from the company's contract manufacturing division's commercial and industrial customers for continued electronic assembly service.
Symetrics is an electronics company that works in the defense and telecommunications industries.
